body:
Are you using keras for your LSTM or tf.nn.dynamic_rnn?

On Wed, Apr 18, 2018 at 8:41 AM, Hesam Moshiri <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> are the results consistent if you use static_rnn instead of dynamic_rnn?
>
